title: TileConfig
description: Schema for using a Tile inside a Mosaic (invocation/binding).

id.description: Local alias of the tile within the mosaic.

tileId.description: Identifier of the tile to invoke (links to a TileDeployment).

tileVersion.description: Version of the tile to invoke.

uses.description: Optional reference to a TileDeployment manifest (file path, URL, or registry URI).

request.description: ID of the request definition within the TileDeployment to invoke.

params.title: TileConfigParams
params.description: Parameter values or bindings to provide when invoking the tile request.
